text: Lourdes Domínguez Lino took revenge for losing the final in last year and defeated the defending champion Flavia Pennetta 7–6(7–3), 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Copa Colsanitas Seguros Bolivar - Singles 2006 Singles
title: 2006 Copa Colsanitas Seguros Bolivar – Singles
